thread.title: Larry David plays Bernie Sanders on 'SNL'
thread.title_full: Larry David plays Bernie Sanders on 'SNL' | Boston Herald

author: Variety Staff
title: Larry David plays Bernie Sanders on 'SNL'
text:
Larry David surprised the "Saturday Night Live" audience during the show's cold open when he spoofed presidential candidate Bernie Sanders in a mock Democratic debate opposite Hillary Clinton (Kate McKinnon).
"Coming next November I will beâ€¦ Hillary Clinton's Vice President!" he exclaimed.
In addition to McKinnon, the "Curb Your Enthusiasm" star was joined by special guest Alec Baldwin in the sketch.
Hosted by Tracy Morgan, the Oct. 17 episode also featured a mini "30 Rock" reunion with Morgan's co-stars Tina Fey, Baldwin and Jane Krakowski.
